item.title: Lab 1
item.description: The purpose of this lab is to get you working with base R looping functions while also being careful about data types. Your are welcome to work with a partner or in a small group of 3-4 people. Data structures set.seed(123) # Set random number generation m <- lm(mpg ~ hp + cyl + drat, mtcars) l <- list(a = list(m = matrix(1:12, ncol = 3), v = 1:7), b = data.
